price: Woi nom ka nyansa, adwen (ne suban pa) a wo Wura Nyankopͻn ayi akyerε woͻ no ho. Na εnyε nyame foforͻ bi nnka Nyankopͻn ho, (sε ԑba saa a,) yԑbԑto wo atwene Amanehunu gyem, abᴐ wo soboᴐ, apo wo (ayi wo afri Nyame ahummᴐborᴐ no mu).
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ مِمَّآ أَوۡحَىٰٓ إِلَيۡكَ رَبُّكَ مِنَ ٱلۡحِكۡمَةِۗ وَلَا تَجۡعَلۡ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَتُلۡقَىٰ فِي جَهَنَّمَ مَلُومٗا مَّدۡحُورًا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: dhālika mimmā awḥā ilayka rabbuka mina al-ḥik'mati walā tajʿal maʿa al-lahi ilāhan ākhara fatul'qā fī jahannama malūman madḥūran
